CPlatformVert.cpp

00001 #include "CPlatform.h"
00002 #include "../../spritedefines.h"
00003 // vertically-moving platform (ep3)
00004 
00005 enum platver_actions{
00006 PLATVERT_MOVE, PLATVERT_WAIT
00007 };
00008 
00009 #define PLATVERT_WAITTIME       35
00010 #define PLATVERT_MOVE_SPD       23
00011 
00012 #define PLATVERT_ANIM_RATE      15
00013 
00014 #define PLATVERTPUSHAMOUNT      10
00015 
00016 CPlatformVert::CPlatformVert(CMap *p_map, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00017   std::vector<CPlayer>& Player) :
00018 CPlatform(p_map, x, y, Player)
00019 {
00020  animframe = 0;
00021  animtimer = 0;
00022  movedir = UP;
00023  state = PLATVERT_MOVE;
00024 
00025  blockedu = false;
00026  blockedd = true;
00027  inhibitfall = 1;
00028  needinit = 0;
00029  canbezapped = 1;
00030  SetAllCanSupportPlayer(1);
00031 
00032  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00033  for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00034  {
00035   kickedplayer[it_player->m_index] = 0;
00036  }
00037 }
00038 
00039 void CPlatformVert::process()
00040 {
00041  // after kicking a player, wait until he falls beneath the platform
00042  // before turning cansupportplayer back on...just in case we also
00043  // check for if he stopped falling
00044  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00045  for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00046  {
00047   if (kickedplayer[it_player->m_index])
00048   {
00049    if (it_player->getYPosition() > getYPosition() ||
00050      (!it_player->pfalling && !it_player->pjumping))
00051    {
00052     cansupportplayer = 1;
00053     kickedplayer[it_player->m_index] = 0;
00054    }
00055   }
00056  }
00057 
00058  sprite = OBJ_PLATFORM_DEFSPRITE_EP3 + animframe;
00059 
00060  if (animtimer > PLATVERT_ANIM_RATE)
00061  {
00062   animframe ^= 1;
00063   animtimer = 0;
00064  }
00065  else animtimer++;
00066 
00067  switch(state)
00068  {
00069  case PLATVERT_MOVE:
00070 
00071   if (movedir==UP)
00072   {
00073    if (blockedu)
00074    {
00075     movedir = DOWN;
00076     waittimer = 0;
00077     state = PLATVERT_WAIT;
00078    }
00079    else
00080    {
00081     moveUp(PLATVERT_MOVE_SPD);
00082 
00083     std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00084     for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00085     {
00086      if( it_player->supportedbyobject && it_player->psupportingobject==m_index &&
00087        (it_player->pjumping==PNOJUMP||it_player->pjumping==PPREPAREJUMP||it_player->pjumping==PPREPAREPOGO))
00088      {
00089       if (!kickedplayer[it_player->m_index])
00090       {
00091        it_player->moveUp(PLATVERT_MOVE_SPD);
00092       }
00093       // kick player off if we're running him into the ceiling
00094       if (it_player->blockedu)
00095       {
00096        cansupportplayer = 0;
00097        kickedplayer[it_player->m_index] = 1;
00098       }
00099      }
00100     }
00101    }
00102   }
00103   else if (movedir==DOWN)
00104   {
00105    if (blockedd)
00106     movedir = UP;
00107    else
00108    {
00109     moveDown(PLATVERT_MOVE_SPD);
00110 
00111     std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00112     for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00113     {
00114      if( it_player->supportedbyobject && it_player->psupportingobject==m_index &&
00115        (it_player->pjumping==PNOJUMP||it_player->pjumping==PPREPAREJUMP||it_player->pjumping==PPREPAREPOGO))
00116      {
00117       if (!kickedplayer[it_player->m_index])
00118        it_player->moveDown(PLATVERT_MOVE_SPD);
00119      }
00120     }
00121    }
00122   }
00123   break;
00124  case PLATVERT_WAIT:
00125   if (waittimer > PLATVERT_WAITTIME)
00126    state = PLATVERT_MOVE;
00127 
00128   else
00129    waittimer++;
00130   break;
00131  }
00132 }
00133 
00134 void CPlatformVert::getTouchedBy(CObject &theObject)
00135 {
00136  if(hitdetect(theObject))
00137  {
00138   // push player horizontally
00139   if( theObject.m_type == OBJ_PLAYER )
00140   {
00141    CPlayer &Player = dynamic_cast<CPlayer&>(theObject);
00142    if(Player.pfalling or !Player.supportedbyobject)
00143     Player.push(*this);
00144    else if( state == PLATVERT_MOVE )
00145     Player.moveYDir( (movedir==UP) ? -PLATVERT_MOVE_SPD : PLATVERT_MOVE_SPD);
00146   }
00147  }
00148 }
